TextView.android:text: 2-4 Muscle Ups (b)
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Muscle Ups (p) ---> 5 Transitional Dips (p)
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 15kg Dips ---> 12x 15kg Pull Ups
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
15 Pull Ups ---> 12 Russian Dips
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Skull Crushers ---> Max Diamond Push Ups
x2 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
5x 90kg Squats
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
7x 80kg Squats ---> 10x 30kg Bulgarian Split Squats (E/S)
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 60kg Squats
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Assisted Pistol Squats (E/S)
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
5 Muscle Ups (b)
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
3 Muscle Ups (b) ---> 5 Muscle Ups (p) ---> 7 Muscle Ups (g)
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
20 Straight Bar Dips ---> 20 Pull Ups ---> 20 Push Ups
x3-4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 seconds L-Sit Hold ---> 5 Toes to Bar
x5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Front Lever Raises
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
40 Sit Ups ---> 40 Roman Twists ---> 1 min Plank with 20kg
x3 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 min Hollow Hold with 10kg ---> 1 min Hollow Hold
x3 Sets (2 min rest inbetween sets)
10 Raised Pike Push Ups
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Front Lever Tuck Hold ---> Max Back Lever Tuck Hold
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Muscle Ups (b)
x3 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Muscle Ups (p)
x3 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Muscle Ups (g)
x3 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Pull Ups ---> Max Straight Bar Dips
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 50kg Squats ---> Max 40kg Lunges
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Intermediate Program Level 1 - Week 4
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
Repeat the weekly routine until you can achieve 10 Muscle Ups on the black band, without breaking the set.
